summary: This mod retextures of the vampire dog of Dawnguard - 2 texture options in SD (1024x1024) or HD (2048x2048)
descriptionHtml:
This mod retextures of the vampire dog of Dawnguard with two texture options in SD (1024x1024) or HD (2048x2048).

I hope you enjoy it!

[u][b]Change-Log:[/b][/u]

- adding compressed textures

[u][b]REQUIREMENT:[/b][/u]

- Dawnguard-DLC

[u][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/u]

Copy the files into your Skyrim data folder or use NMM for installation.

[u][b]UNINSTALLATION:[/b][/u]

Simply delete the files from your Skyrim data folder or uncheck this mod on NMM.

[u][b]My other Mods:[/b][/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34060]Improved Dawnguard Vampire Eyes - glowing and non-glowing[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38541/?]Dawnguard Bloodstone Chalice Retexture[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39765/?]Tutorial - How to create vampires with non-ungly faces in a simple way[/url]
author: ViewtifulFlo
